entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow changing to snow and ending near midnight then clearing. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
